channel.title: Fatal error jave runtime please help!
channel.description:
Okay so ill start the server and client and logg in fine, then when i click somewhere on the map in-game or ask to trade the client instantly shuts down :mad:
On the server script thing it comes up with ..
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 3 3 # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d841e06, pid=3700, t id=5312 # # JRE version: 6.0_17-b04 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.3-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51e06] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Corey\Desktop\Exion\Client\hs_err_pid3700.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Fatal error jave runtime please help!
item.dc:creator: @Opitate Opitate@hotmail.com
item.description:
@Opitate wrote:

Okay so ill start the server and client and logg in fine, then when i click somewhere on the map in-game or ask to trade the client instantly shuts down :mad:

On the server script thing it comes up with …

Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
3
3
